name: Mad Cows (JudgeClark)
description:
An entry for the 60 minute jam

A new strain of BSE has infected your herd and not only is it making them a bit jittery ...they seem to be multiplying.

You must get the milk from the milk river (I'm no dairy expert) into the churns without being bovinely intercepted.

TIP OF THE DAY: Give them a second to spawn after dropping your delivery

Arrow keys to move
 R= restart
